title: News | Chicago Defender
text: News [](https://chicagodefender.com/david-michael-milliner-former-defender-editor-and-publisher-passes-away/) David Michael Milliner, Former Defender Editor and Publisher, Passes Away January 4, 2024 By: Tacuma Roeback, Managing Editor [](https://chicagodefender.com/this-week-in-black-history-january-3-9-2024/) This Week In Black History January 3-9, 2024 January 4, 2024 By: Site Editor [](https://chicagodefender.com/appeals-court-halts-state-run-court-in-mississippis-black-majority-capital/) Appeals Court Halts State-Run Court In Mississippi’s Black-Majority Capital January 4, 2024 By: Black Information Network [](https://chicagodefender.com/how-claudine-gays-harvard-resignation-reveals-americas-deep-racial-divide/) How Claudine Gay’s Harvard Resignation Reveals America’s Deep Racial Divide January 3, 2024 By: A.R. Shaw, Executive Editor [](https://chicagodefender.com/prominent-community-organization-names-robbins-mayor-2023-mayor-of-the-year/) Prominent Community Organization Names Robbins Mayor ‘2023 Mayor of The Year’ January 3, 2024 By: Staff Report [](https://chicagodefender.com/101-year-old-woman-set-to-graduate-college-alongside-granddaughter/) 101-Year-Old Woman Set To Graduate College Alongside Granddaughter January 3, 2024 By: Black Information Network [](https://chicagodefender.com/memphis-sanitation-worker-who-marched-with-mlk-dead-at-92/) Memphis Sanitation Worker Who Marched With MLK Dead At 92 January 3, 2024 By: Black Information Network [](https://chicagodefender.com/chicago-defender-the-stories-that-defined-chicago-in-2023-part-2/) Chicago Defender: The Stories that Defined Chicago in 2023, Part 2 January 2, 2024 By: Tacuma Roeback, Managing Editor [](https://chicagodefender.com/the-10-best-films-of-2023/) The 10 Best Films of 2023 January 2, 2024 By: Special Contributor [](https://chicagodefender.com/chicago-defender-the-news-stories-that-defined-chicago-in-2023-part-1/) Chicago Defender: The News Stories that Defined Chicago in 2023, Part 1 January 1, 2024 By: Tacuma Roeback, Managing Editor
